Event: On 2023-12-30, EIGS terrorists claimed an IED attack near Ménaka on a joint patrol of FAMa and Russian mercenaries (Africa Corps), killing several and evacuating injured by helicopter. Mali remains dangerous for foreigners due to terrorism.
Description: On December 30, 2023, EIGS terrorists carried out an IED attack near Ménaka targeting a joint patrol of the Malian Armed Forces (FAMa) and Russian mercenaries from the Africa Corps, resulting in multiple casualties and the evacuation of injured personnel by helicopter. This incident highlights the ongoing security risks in Mali, particularly the dangers posed by terrorism to foreign nationals.
Slant: The message presents a security-focused slant emphasizing the danger terrorism poses in Mali, especially to foreigners.
Reliability: B2 - The information is specific in detail and date, but it relies on claims by a terrorist group without independent verification, so moderate confidence is warranted.
